mapper.select: SELECT JMNICKNAME, SPTITLE, SPADDR1, SPADDR2, EXTRAADDR, MEMSID, SPHSID, SPHSTART, SPHEND ,SRWSID, STLESID, SPMAXPET, SPSID, GRADE, PRICE FROM SITTING_PLACE_LIST_VIEW
SELECT ISPT_SID AS ISPTSID, ISPT_NAME AS ISPTNAME FROM INDEX_SITTING_PLACE_TAG ORDER BY ISPT_SID
SELECT ISPTSID, ISPTNAME, SPSID FROM SITTING_PLACE_TAGS_VIEW
SELECT NVL(COUNT(SL_SID), 0) AS SLCOUNT FROM SITTING_LICENSE SL JOIN STS_CONDITION_VIEW SCV ON SL.STS_SID = SCV.STS_SID WHERE SCV.MEM_SID = #{memSid}
SELECT SBSID, SBSTARTYEAR, SBSTARTMONTH, SBSTARTDAY, SBEND, SBPRICE, PMEMSID FROM SITTING_BOOK_VIEW WHERE MEMSID = #{memSid}

SELECT JMNICKNAME, SPMAXPET, SPTITLE, SPCONTENT, SPADDR1, SPADDR2, EXTRAADDR, SPZIPCODE, IPSID, SPSID , TO_CHAR(SPHSTART, 'HH24:MI') AS SPHSTART, TO_CHAR(SPHEND, 'HH24:MI') AS SPHEND
FROM SITTING_PLACE_BASIC_VIEW WHERE MEMSID = #{memSid} ORDER BY SPCREATED DESC

SELECT JMNICKNAME, SPTITLE, SPCONTENT, SPADDR1, SPADDR2, EXTRAADDR, MEMSID, SPHSID, SPHSTART, SPHEND ,SRWSID, STLESID, SPMAXPET, SPSID, GRADE, PRICE FROM SITTING_PLACE_LIST_VIEW WHERE MEMSID = #{memSid}
SELECT SRWSID, SRWTITLE, SRWCONTENT, SRWRATE, SRWDATE, MEMSID, PMEMSID, PJMNICKNAME FROM SITTING_REVIEW_VIEW WHERE MEMSID = #{memSid} ORDER BY SRWDATE DESC
SELECT SPSID, PJMNICKNAME, SRPLINK, SRPDATE, PMEMSID, SRWSID FROM SITTING_REVIEW_PHOTO_VIEW
SELECT MEMSID, GRADE, JMNICKNAME, SPHSID, SPSID, FOLLOWINGCOUNT, SRWCOUNT, SRWRATEAVG, STLECOUNT FROM SITTING_FOLLOWINGCOUNT_VIEW
SELECT JM_NICKNAME AS PJMNICKNAME, MEM_SID AS PMEMSID FROM JOIN_MEMBER

SELECT SPSID, ISPTNAME, ISPTSID FROM SITTING_PLACE_TAGS_VIEW WHERE SPSID IN (SELECT SPSID FROM SITTING_PLACE_TAGS_VIEW WHERE 1=1
AND ISPTSID IN
#{isptSid}
GROUP BY SPSID HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT ISPTSID) = #{isptSidListInteger.size()})

SELECT SB.SB_SID AS SBSID, SB.SB_START AS SBSTART, SB.SB_END AS SBEND FROM SITTING_CANCEL SCL JOIN SITTING_BOOK SB ON SCL.SB_SID = SB.SB_SID JOIN SITTING_CREATE_CART SCC ON SB.SCC_SID = SCC.SCC_SID JOIN MEMBER MEM ON SCC.MEM_SID = MEM.MEM_SID JOIN JOIN_MEMBER JM ON MEM.MEM_SID = JM.MEM_SID WHERE SCL.SCL_DATE = SYSDATE AND JM.MEM_SID = #{memSid}
SELECT NVL(MAX(STS_SID), 0) AS STSSID FROM SITTING_TEST_SUBMIT
SELECT NVL(MAX(STR_SID), 0) AS STRSID FROM SITTING_TEST_RECEIVE
SELECT STB_SID AS STBSID, STB_QUESTION AS STBQUESTION, STB_ANSWER AS STBANSWER, STB_POINT AS STBPOINT FROM(SELECT * FROM SITTING_TEST_BANK ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SITTING_TEST_PAPER (STR_SID, STB_SID1, STB_SID2, STB_SID3, STB_SID4, STB_SID5, STB_SID6, STB_SID7, STB_SID8, STB_SID9, STB_SID10) VALUES (#{strsid}, #{stbsid1}, #{stbsid2}, #{stbsid3}, #{stbsid4}, #{stbsid5}, #{stbsid6}, #{stbsid7}, #{stbsid8}, #{stbsid9}, #{stbsid10})
mapper.select: SELECT SPC_STANDARD AS SPCSTANDARD FROM SITTING_PASS_CUT ORDER BY SPC_SID DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SITTING_TEST_SUBMIT(STS_SID, STR_SID, TOTAL_SCORE) VALUES(SEQ_STS.NEXTVAL, #{strsid}, #{totalScore})
mapper.select: SELECT SRWSID, SRWTITLE, SRWCONTENT, SRWRATE, SRWDATE, MEMSID, PMEMSID, SBSID, SBSTART, SBEND FROM SITTING_REVIEW_VIEW WHERE SRWDATE = SYSDATE AND MEMSID = #{memSid}

SELECT SRR.SP_SID AS SPSID FROM SITTING_REPORT_COMPLETE SRC JOIN INDEX_MANAGER_ACTION IMA ON SRC.IMA_SID = IMA.IMA_SID JOIN SITTING_REPORT_RECEIVE SRR ON SRC.SRR_SID = SRR.SRR_SID WHERE IMA.IMA_SID = 4 AND SRC.SRC_DATE = SYSDATE AND SRR.SP_SID = ( SELECT SPH.SP_SID FROM SITTING_PLACE_HUB SPH JOIN SITTING_FOLLOWING_LIST SFL ON SPH.SPH_SID = SFL.SPH_SID JOIN MEMBER MEM ON SFL.MEM_SID = MEM.MEM_SID JOIN JOIN_MEMBER JM ON MEM.MEM_SID = JM.MEM_SID WHERE MEM.MEM_SID = #{memSid})

SELECT TO_CHAR(SB.SB_START,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SBSTART, TO_CHAR(SB.SB_END, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SBEND, MEM.MEM_SID AS PMEMSID, SB.SB_SID AS SBSID FROM SITTING_BOOK SB JOIN SITTING_CREATE_CART SCC ON SB.SCC_SID = SCC.SCC_SID JOIN MEMBER MEM ON SCC.MEM_SID = MEM.MEM_SID WHERE SB.SB_DATE = SYSDATE AND SCC.MEM_SID = #{memSid}

SELECT TO_CHAR(SB.SB_START,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SBSTART, TO_CHAR(SB.SB_END, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SBEND, MEM.MEM_SID AS MEMSID, SB.SB_SID AS SBSID FROM SITTING_BOOK SB JOIN SITTING_PLACE_HUB SPH ON SB.SPH_SID = SPH.SPH_SID JOIN SITTING_LICENSE SL ON SPH.SL_SID = SL.SL_SID JOIN SITTING_TEST_SUBMIT STS ON SL.STS_SID = STS.STS_SID JOIN SITTING_TEST_RECEIVE STR ON STS.STR_SID = STR.STR_SID JOIN MEMBER MEM ON STR.MEM_SID = MEM.MEM_SID WHERE SB.SB_DATE = SYSDATE AND MEM.MEM_SID = #{memSid}
SELECT MEMSID, GRADE, JMNICKNAME, SPHSID, SPSID, FOLLOWINGCOUNT, SRWCOUNT, SRWRATEAVG, STLECOUNT FROM SITTING_FOLLOWINGCOUNT_VIEW WHERE ROWNUM <= 3

SELECT MEMSID, TO_CHAR(SR.SR_START, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SRSTART, TO_CHAR(SR.SR_END, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SREND, SPLV.SPSID FROM SITTING_PLACE_LIST_VIEW SPLV JOIN SITTING_REST SR ON SPLV.SPHSID = SR.SPH_SID WHERE MEMSID = #{memSid} ORDER BY SR.SR_START
SELECT DISTINCT NVL(MAX(SBSID), 0) AS SBSID FROM RESERVATION_INFO WHERE MEMSID = #{memsid} ORDER BY SBSID DESC

SELECT SL.SL_SID AS SLSID FROM SITTING_LICENSE SL JOIN SITTING_TEST_SUBMIT STS ON SL.STS_SID = STS.STS_SID JOIN SITTING_TEST_RECEIVE STR ON STS.STR_SID = STR.STR_SID JOIN MEMBER MEM ON STR.MEM_SID = MEM.MEM_SID WHERE MEM.MEM_SID = #{memSid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SITTING_PLACE(SP_SID, SP_TITLE, SP_CONTENT, SP_ADDR1, SP_ADDR2, SP_ZIPCODE, SP_CREATED, SP_MAX_PET, IP_SID, SP_EXTRAADDR) VALUES(SEQ_SP.NEXTVAL, #{sptitle}, #{spContent}, #{spAddr1}, #{spAddr2}, #{spZipCode}, SYSDATE, #{spMaxPet}, #{ipSid}, #{extraAddr})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(MAX(SP_SID),0) AS SPSID FROM SITTING_PLACE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SITTING_PLACE_HUB(SPH_SID, SL_SID, SP_SID, SPH_START, SPH_END) VALUES(SEQ_SPH.NEXTVAL, #{slSid}, #{spSid}, TO_DATE(#{sphStart}, 'HH24:MI'), TO_DATE(#{sphEnd}, 'HH24:MI'))
INSERT INTO SITTING_PLACE_PHOTO(SPP_SID, SPP_PATH, SP_SID, SPP_NAME) VALUES(SEQ_SPP.NEXTVAL, #{sppPath}, #{spSid}, #{sppName})
INSERT INTO SITTING_PLACE_TAG(SPT_SID, SP_SID, ISPT_SID) VALUES(SEQ_SPT.NEXTVAL, #{spSid}, #{isptSid})
INSERT INTO SITTING_CART(SC_SID, SCC_SID, PET_SID) VALUES(SEQ_SC.NEXTVAL, #{sccSid}, #{petSid})

INSERT INTO SITTING_BOOK(SB_SID, SPH_SID, SB_START, SB_END, SB_DATE, SB_PRICE, SCC_SID) VALUES(SEQ_SB.NEXTVAL, #{sphSid},TO_DATE(#{sbStart}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ,TO_DATE(#{sbEnd}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), SYSDATE, #{price}, #{sccSid})
